# createListItemRef() function

Creates callback ref for list item at specified index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createListItemRef: (model: VirtualScroller, itemIndex: number) => (el: HTMLElement | null) => void
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

[VirtualScroller](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller)


</td><td>

[VirtualScroller](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller) instance


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

itemIndex


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

item index


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns**

(el: HTMLElement \| null) =&gt; void

callback ref

## Remarks

Calls [VirtualScroller.attachItem()](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.attachitem) when item is mounted and [VirtualScroller.detachItem()](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.detachitem) when item is about to unmount.
